title: Clipboard text missing from queue view
description: Clipboard items are not visible in the queue list in some scenarios. Diagnose and ensure copied text reliably appears in the UI, even when the window is hidden or the app is inactive.

title: Liquid Glass UI refresh for macOS 26
description: Update queue and preferences UI to use macOS 26 Tahoe Liquid Glass materials, modern spacing/typography, and current HIG guidance.

title: Enable Dock icon with app asset
description: Remove menu-bar-only configuration and ensure the app appears in the Dock with a proper app icon.

title: Add search bar with real-time filtering
description: Provide a search field that filters clipboard items live with debounce for responsiveness.

title: Categories with color coding
description: Allow users to create categories, assign items, and display color-coded indicators in the list.

title: History view
description: Maintain a persistent history of clipboard items separate from the queue.

title: Pin items for persistence
description: Add pinning so important items stay at the top and persist across restarts.

title: Show source app icons
description: Capture the source app and show its icon for each clipboard item; fallback gracefully when unavailable.

title: Scale to millions of items
description: Optimize data storage, rendering, and search to handle millions of clipboard items without crashing or lag.

title: Expand settings customization
description: Add settings for monitoring behavior, appearance, history retention, and animation speed.

title: Context menus for list and items
description: Provide right-click context menus with actions like copy, pin, delete, categorize.

title: Smooth animations with speed control
description: Ensure list animations run at 60fps and add a setting to adjust speed.

title: Responsive layout for all window sizes
description: Adapt layout and typography for small and large window sizes without truncation.

title: Add preferences for tabs, paste newline, auto-resize, and tab persistence
close_reason: Preferences already include tab visibility, queue paste newline trigger, auto-resize, and return-to-queue options.

title: Add preference to automatically press Command+Enter after each paste
description: Add a new setting 'Press Command+Enter after paste' that automatically simulates pressing Cmd+Enter after each ClipQueue paste operation. This is useful for workflows where Enter submits content (like chat applications).

title: Fix menu bar icon customization
description: Ensure menu bar icon uses selected SF Symbol or custom image at launch and on preference change.
close_reason: Adjusted menu bar icon handling to apply template/scaling and fallbacks.

title: Fix automatic paste - Control+Q should paste directly into focused text field
description:
When Control+Q is pressed, the item should automatically paste into the last selected/focused text field without requiring manual Cmd+V. Currently only copies to clipboard but doesn't actually paste.

Root cause: CGEvent simulation might not be targeting the right application or focus might be lost.

Solution: Activate the frontmost application before simulating Cmd+V to ensure focus is correct.

title: Verify ClipQueue UX changes (selection, tabs, menu bar icon, shortcuts)
Add multi-selection actions and drag-to-paste for queue items
description: Support cmd/shift selection, delete/enter/ctrl-w/space actions, context menu Add to Favorites, and drag item to external text field to paste content.
close_reason: Implemented selection ordering/paste behavior and drag providers.

title: Implement flexible keyboard shortcut recording and registration
description: Allow any key combo (including no modifiers) for shortcuts; record keycodes; update hotkey registration without restart.
close_reason: Added event-tap fallback for shortcuts without command/option/control.

title: Implement favorites/recents tabs and segmented picker layout
description: Add Favorites and Recents sections to UI, move History to bottom picker, remove 'View' label, and apply layout rules based on visible tab count.
close_reason: Segmented pickers for Queue/Favorites and History/Recents already present; no additional code needed.
